title: Tesseracts Fifteen: A Case of Quite Curious Tales
description: In this new volume of the long running and popular Tesseracts series, editors Julie Czerneda and Susan MacGregor have selected 21 of the best young adult sicence fiction, fantasy and horror stories from over 300 works submitted . All of the selected stories are speculative fiction and are rated PG-14. These stories are filled with "wonder and astonishment" said the editors. They are "stories that engage the imagination, inspire dreams, and leave hope in their wake. They will become the classics for a new generation of readers."
author: Julie E. Czerneda
